name: Kojo Funds
description: '''Errol Bellot''', known professionally as '''Kojo Funds''' ({{IPAc-en|k|oʊ|dʒ|oʊ|_|f|ʌ|n|d|z}} {{Respell|KOH|joh|_|FUNDZ}}), is an English singer, [[rapper]], and songwriter. His music blends West African and Caribbean sounds with [[road rap]], [[dancehall]], and [[British pop music|pop]]. Kojo Funds featured on [[Yxng Bane]]'s single "Fine Wine" and on [[Mabel (singer)|Mabel]]'s "[[Finders Keepers (Mabel song)|Finders Keepers]]". His own singles include "Check" with [[Raye]].
